item.description:
OK the summer is trying to wind down really fast on us, its going to get cool this weekend so lets go out to the Tap for some dinner and dancing to DCMS on what could be the last "on the deck" event.

 

We will meet for dinner at 7:00pm, talk, laugh and have a good time.  The band goes on at 9pm and we can dance the rest of the night away.

 

Please remember to take the Meetup Cell number with you so if you get lost, are running late or have to cancel at the last minute.  The number is 978-304-2811.

 

Also, if you havent paid your dues this year, please consider helping out the organizers by paying your dues at this event.

Hope to see you all at The Tap.

 

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Look for our table either on the deck or in the restaurant
item.name: Dinner & Dancing @ The Tap
